Install Git for Home Assistant core Configuration On Raspberry Pi 3B+ step by step (version 2022.11.4)

 

#Make sure you are in the /config directory

cd /home/homeassistant20221103/.homeassistant

 

Creating .gitignore

 

#Initialize this repository with a README

echo "# Home-AssistantConfig20221104" >> README.md  

 

#Initialize the Git repo

git init

git config user.email "mail@mail.cn"

git config user.name "mail"

 

Creating Repository on GitHub

https://github.com/freemsly/Home-AssistantConfig20221103.git

 

git remote add origin https://github.com/freemsly/Home-AssistantConfig20221103.git

git branch -M main

 

git add README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

 

git add .

git commit -m "home assistant core Initialize filies while run first"

 

#create dir custom_components

custom_components

 

git push -u origin main
